title: 8 in. Silver Blade Automotive Folding Snow Shovel with Bag
description: Tackle snow, soil, sand and more with this compact all-purpose folding shovel. A telescoping handle with a T-shaped polypropylene grip allows the shovel to adjust to work comfortably. It can be used in multiple positions by unfolding and positioning the T-shaped handle to easily move dirt, snow or other debris. Durably constructed of anodized aluminum, this shovel can handle all kinds of tasks. Once done, simply push the black button at the base of the blade to unlock and fold it, collapse the telescoping handle and stash in the included carrying bag. Keep this shovel handy in a vehicle for emergencies or camping and hiking trips.
